email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. We have an opportunity to ship 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarao to Qingdao. The vessel we are considering is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The starting freight rate is USD 25.50 per MT on a CIF basis. Laycan is set for June 1-5, 2024.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any additional details.

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering it to USD 24.00 per MT? Also, could you provide the vessel's last three B/Ls and the IMO compliance certificate?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your prompt response. I understand your concern about the rate. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 24.50 per MT. I have attached the requested documents for your review.

Please let me know if this revised rate is acceptable.

Best regards,
James Lee

[ATTACHMENTS: vessel_certs.pdf, BL_history.pdf, imo_compliance.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the revised rate and the documents. We can proceed with the rate of USD 24.50 per MT. Could you confirm the laycan dates and provide the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Great to hear that the revised rate works for you. The laycan remains June 1-5, 2024. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. Please confirm if you need any further details to proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking as discussed. I will send over the official confirmation shortly.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
